Desc.entry: Dedicated to serving the community. Aims to elevate religious, social, educational and intellectual standards. Offers help and support for people from more than 8 different nationalities with cultural and language disparity. Organises study circle and training courses about Islam in different languages, IT courses, life skills courses, English and Arabic language courses, sports and social activities and supplementary schools. Provides counselling, social advice, community enterprise support and career advice and guidance. Provides library and prayer facilities.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bangla, French, Indonesian, Malay, Somali, Urdu
